title: Nightblue is such a bad example for new players
body:
this kid is seriously telling people that AP rek sai is the best way to play rek sai because of his one ability that does magic dmg. i cant tell if he is a genious troll or he just has no idea how to give advice.

edit:
night blue is essentially saying that this skill, when building AP
Prey Seeker RANGE: 1300 COOLDOWN: 11 / 10 / 9 / 8 / 7
MAGIC DAMAGE: 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 100% AP)

is better than this skill

Furious Bite: MINIMUM PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 80 / 90 / 100 / 110 / 120% AD
MAXIMUM/TRUE DAMAGE: 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 / 240% AD

which is capable of outputting 700+ true dmg with just a hydra and triforce.
